response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This product holds immense value to us and has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, we believe it would be a perfect match for your needs and aspirations.

We are offering this remarkable product to you at a special introductory price of $1,350,000. This offer is exclusive to you and represents a significant saving compared to the market value of $1,500,000. We understand the importance of making informed decisions and ensuring that our clients receive unparalleled value, which is why we are confident that this offer presents an excellent opportunity for both parties.

Please consider this offer carefully and let us know if you have any questions or require further information about the product. We are here to assist you every step of the way and ensure a smooth transaction.

Looking forward to your positive response.

Warm regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1350000}
